remarks: Version of ~ bj-equsexv with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-7 , ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-12 , ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-equsexvv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-equsexvv $p |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) <-> ps ) $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
